author: Tom Carreras, AI Boost
title: Bit Digital Exits BTC Mining to Focus Solely on ETH Staking Strategy
description: Crypto miner Bit Digital will sell off its bitcoin operations to deepen its ETH staking and treasury shift.
content:
Bit Digital (BTBT) is changing course to become a dedicated ether 
 staking and treasury operation, the company said Wednesday. The New York-based firm will exit the bitcoin 
 mining business entir… [+1329 chars]
